angle.headline: SB60: 49ers' Red Zone Regression: Quantifying the Odds of a Postseason Collapse
angle.angle: Will the 49ers' red zone efficiency hold up in the Super Bowl? We'll quantify their playoff red zone performance against regular season numbers, identifying key statistical indicators and projecting the impact on SB60 scoring outcomes. Is their earlier success sustainable, or will regression to the mean create betting opportunities?

External factors, such as weather conditions or officiating, will have a greater impact on the game than red zone performance.
